name: Nasty Zombies
storyline: Nasty Zombies takes place in a world devastated by an unnatural catastrophe, where the dead have risen in grotesque, decaying forms. Cities have crumbled, the living are few, and the relentless tide of the undead seems unstoppable. Out of the shadows, the Hollow Monks appeared—silent, ethereal figures, cloaked in flowing robes with no bodies within. No one knows where they came from, but their purpose is clear: to cleanse the world of the zombie scourge. Armed with divine energy and unyielding resolve, they wage a relentless war against the undead, purging every cursed soul in their path. They are the last hope for a world on the brink of oblivion.
summary: Blast through hordes of Nasty Zombies solo or with up to 3 friends! Face dynamic map layouts, ensuring every run is unique. Unlock perks and power-ups with your hard-earned cash in this wave-based, retro-inspired shooter.
